website_summaries.verdict: A true midrange pair of headphones that Sennheiser has designed to deliver great sound at a competitive price.
pros: Unmatched sound quality coming from a pair of headphones half the price of premium options
cons: The design of the headphones allows music to leak

customer_reviews.title: This is the first non-gaming headset I've used and it's great. I'm not a fan of bass
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile by any means, just an average PC user that plays games and listens to music. This is the first non-gaming headset I've used and it's great. I'm not a fan of bass, so I read that open-back is the way to go. The only thing that takes getting used to is that you can hear any ambient noise around you. I decided to get the e10k amp, just in case, and it seems to work well. Personally, (and from what I read) I don't think it's necessary. Once I found the preferred amp settings, I instantly fell in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Musser

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I came from ATH-M50X headphones. Do they sound the same? No. The bass is noticably weaker. But 'weaker' means you notice the bass is weaker when you switch between the two, but you also notice that thunder, explosions, and other rumbling sounds all sound correct in these headphones, rather than overpowering. The downside is that you will hear *any* sound. These headphones provide no sound isolation whatsoever. Cat purring on your lap? You'll hear it if the music/audio is quiet enough. I have worn these headphones for multi-hour (2-3+) gaming sessions and they don't cause my head to hurt the way the ATH-M50X headphones did.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, ok comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These sound amazing but are not as comfortable as my m50x closed headphones. I use these primarily for FPS gaming, which they are truly excellent for. You can hear every footstep and ult announcement in Overwatch clearly differentiated. Highly recommended for gaming - but not sure how they are going to feel on my head after a couple hours of consecutive use. Ear pads fit tightly and are pretty rigid - and I don't have a large head (size 7 1/2 hat).
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for competitive gaming
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these for music, these are my go to gaming headphones. The sound stage,(how far away things can sound) is very large and the treble/highs are strong meaning footsteps are easier to hear. Also these are the most comfortable headphones for long term use for my ears. I have large ears and I find on other headphones my ears rub against the inside of the headphones, causing pain after a few hours. These are not the case and are well ventilated,(on the open back version anyway). If you use hyper Xs, Turtle beaches, or astros its time to buy these and stop buying into gimmicky gaming headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone for everything..
customer_reviews.text: as an average consumer, im not an audiophile but when my friends recommended this headphone for me i didnt hesitate to get it since it was on sale for around 100usd, after buying that cheapo syba dac amp for around 25usd, i was blown away by how better my audio is. Not much bass since they say it is "reference" audio, the bass was still good for me. overall if you ever find this on sale, grab them! you can plug them to your phones too
customer_reviews.author: Maco

customer_reviews.title: but in many ways they are better. For $150
customer_reviews.text: You'll have to be patient with these headphones. When I first plugged these in, I must admit that I wanted a little more kick in the bass. But, after a week I have really grown to appreciate the totality of the sound. Every musical element is well defined, and the bass is very present and natural sounding. These are not Beats, but in many ways they are better. For $150.00 (Now they are $129.00)(I hate when Amazon lowers the price a week after I buy an item) you can't go wrong. By the way, these are the most comfortable headphones I've ever had. Anyone who complains about the comfort of these cans must have a head like Herman Munster.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My first set of open-back headphones, if you're unsure about trying the style these are definitely a good bet. Very lightweight, can wear for hours on end in comfort, keeps my ears nice and cool with the fabric pads. Sound quality is fantastic, compared to the Logitech G633 I had before these have so much more of a balanced profile. Great for pretty much all genres of music as well as gaming. Would certainly recommend for home use, not so much in public as they allow nearly all background noise in (unless you want to hear what's going on, then open-back is great :)
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bamanaboni

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound amazing. First open back headphones purchase and I love these. Great sound quality and good bass tones. The clarity and wide field make music feel much more present. They have a lot of noise leak so those around you can also hear what you are listening to. So be aware of this. Helpful when also needing to hear my surroundings while enjoying them. Like I said the sound quality is fantastic and I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good overall sound.
customer_reviews.text: OK I've had them about 4 Months Now, They just sound better every time I use them. I am really satisfied. I was a DJ for a long time, so I had lots to compare to. I really like the Blue AKG, These are Even Better than the 280 Pro HD, Fuller bass, Fuller Overall Sound. If you get them on sale, you will be Very happy, I am sure. I love these, but I trust the brand, so no worries for me. Cheers TRX.
customer_reviews.author: Traxman 15

customer_reviews.title: Smooth..non fatiguing. No excessive highs or lows.what i wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Audio technicas first. I personally wasnt happy with them. They are harsh to my ears at higher volumes and I cant wear them very long without fatigue. I recieved these 598sr's lastnight and listened to them about 3 hrs. They have less volume over all but stay smooth. And comfort is way better on my fat head. Just what i was looking for.ill keep the other ones for travel or something.
customer_reviews.author: Superrunner48

customer_reviews.title: Great experience, not giving these back!
customer_reviews.text: My final headphones for a long while. I searched and searched and tried and tried and these are by far the best I've ever worn. Give them a try if you are indecisive. The comfort in superb (I have a huge head), the open back style give you the voice feedback you need to not feel you have your head in a 5 gallon bucket. The sound quality is magnificent (I am not an audio geek). And to finish, the style is so nice that they can be worn outside.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan French

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral sound
customer_reviews.text: I go between these, beyerdynamic DT770, and Philips SHP9500. Hands down this is my favorite of the three. In my opinion, the best Neutral sounding headphones under $400-$500. No booming base, no piercing highs. You don't miss anything with these. Listening to your favorite music, you will hear things you never did before. Highly recommend a Tidal subscription if these are your main headphones for music. Amazing for gaming as they are comfortable, and do not cause fatigue in long session. Not great for a loud environment, as there is little to no isolation.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all around
customer_reviews.text: I'd argue these are the best open-back headphones in the price range. Super comfortable, amazing sound quality, the cord is removable and has a mic. The cups are supposedly replaceable as well, but I have not tried removing them. The sound stage is phenomenal, I would highly recommend listening to lossless audio through a DAC to really experience the full capability. The sound itself is not very bassy due to the open-back design.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Patel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The HD 579 is a little smoother, but the dynamic range of the 598 cans is a big plus. Buy either and you won't be disappointed, as long as your amp is up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Alton Wroten

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a company that knows sound
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones. They work great for PC gaming. The Maximus X Hero on board audio is powerful enough to drive these bad boys. The only thing I with they came with a longer 3.5mm cord. I don't need the mic feature of the short cord and the adapter for the long cord is awkward. Sennheiser make a longer 3.5mm cord and these would be perfect. The ear cups are perfect for extended gaming sessions.
customer_reviews.author: SycsFinest

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Another good product from Sennheiser. I'm with these headphones already a few months and it's Perfect. I plug the headphones to my FX-AUDIO DAC X6 and the sound it's great! I like the lightweight of the headphones, even 8 hours of using and not feeling that I'm with the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: ShaharM

customer_reviews.title: Whatda.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome. For people who love the natural sound in their music and want to hear every detail in a rich sound, these are worth the money. At first, since I was used to less professional headphones, I had to take some time to get used to these. The comfort is at an extreme level and I could easily use them for hours on end. My ears don’t touch the inside of the cup and that is one factor of the comfort. The velour cushions are also excellent too. (Markiplier uses the same headphones.)
customer_reviews.author: DannyT

customer_reviews.title: Favorite headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these to game and listen to music and these are by far my favorite. I have tried and own the phillips sph9500, beyerdynamics dt 990, dt770, audio technica m40x and these still feel and sound the best
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Barraza

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these headphones! I can wear them for hours at a time and they don’t hurt. Half the time I forget I’m even wearing them. The sound quality is amazing. I use them for my computer and I’ll never go back to using “computer gaming headphones”
customer_reviews.author: Rollingstone

customer_reviews.title: Sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sounds awesome. I have no clue what people are talking about when they say the bass is lacking. I guess they just want subs strapped to their head. Everything is clear and precise.
customer_reviews.author: John Craft

customer_reviews.title: Not for gaming !!! Music yes
customer_reviews.text: I got the hd 598 sr for gaming mainly but they arent that great directional sound isnt that great comfort is ok my game zero has better pads but for music oh my god they are awsome i didnt rly play music now i do i also attached my modmic 5 to it which is also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz R

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great clear sound, Very comfortable as well. Pair these headphones with a good sound card and they sound amazing. Sure you could drop 1000+ bucks on some headphones plus an amp to get an even better sound. But honestly these headphones are among the best I've used for under $200. So if you only want to spend around $200 for some headphones, I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Such a solid pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are just great. They come with a long and short cable and sound awesome. They aren't the best, but you can't beat them at the price. Comfortable and sound great. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: As a regular headphone user, these have been my best so far!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with a Fiio DAC and I was instantly mindblown by the clarity, range and the depth of sound. The headphone in itself is great for its price, and if you are looking want to step it up a notch, buy a portable DAC. It beats "beats" and certain bose models which are priced higher than this guy. A certain recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeet Dholakia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic balance.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones out-of-the-box delivered a beautiful, mellow sound that gave classical works the spectrum of a live orchestra, without straining the top end. It was hard to stop listening!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Lemmers

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones --- well-made, comfortable and pleasant sound. Why only 4 stars? Not great mid-range definition and I'm shopping for something to use for mixing. If you're looking for listening headphones, these are very nice at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TKL

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones
customer_reviews.text: What a great set of headphones, I've tried others but keep coming back to these... With the open back mesh, you don't get that closed-in ear feeling, you can hear what's happening around you, and long sessions are no problem... And the sound quality is amazing. Love these
customer_reviews.author: Gaspard Leon

customer_reviews.title: A bit too flat of a sound for me
customer_reviews.text: I gave these 3 stars because they just are not exciting enough to warrant the use of a wire over bluetooth headphones. The main reason is the flat response, its not a V shape sound that I found out I prefer very much over neutral. The comments of big soundstage is overblown, I did not get the feeling at all. On the other hand the comments about lack of bass are kind of off, its got bass for sure. I returned it and will keep using my V shape JBLs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using these headphones with Sennheiser GSX 1000 AMP/DAC amazing sounds, preparing to purchase a modmic soon for ...
customer_reviews.text: Using these headphones with Sennheiser GSX 1000 AMP/DAC amazing sounds, preparing to purchase a modmic soon for this headphones other than that great quality. 1 Con against my PC 363D headset is the top foam is pretty hard almost feels like bonded leather instead of the sponge material from the pc 363d
customer_reviews.author: Why Me

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing great nothing bad. They are comfy. Not impressed with the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Bertram

customer_reviews.title: great headphones as this is my first studio headphones very ...
customer_reviews.text: great headphones as this is my first studio headphones very comfortable and good sound for music and gaming (i use special mix equalizer for music) (and i use scout mode for gaming) good combination with SoundBlaster Z it just the cable with the mic is too short (i know it for phone)but i still thought the mic cable would be enough and now i have to buy an individual mic
customer_reviews.author: Thamer

customer_reviews.title: Made me realize I was missing out on great sound experience after switching
customer_reviews.text: Made me realize I was missing out on great sound experience after switching. I have been using gaming headsets for a while but after experience/hearing the sound of this pair of headphones - well, I am glad I did because I definitely wont be going back to overpriced gaming headsets anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rex D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Quite comfortable, but I can notice the squeeze after 1.5 hour of use. Definitely doesn't feel like your not wearing headphones, but tolerable. I like having both 1.5mm and 1/4" jack cables and that the cable is removable.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality Open-Back Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm not going to write a thorough review as I'm not an audiophile, but these are seriously some of the best headphones I have ever used. If you're looking for some great open-back headphones, look no further and buy these right now. Seriously, I think they're that good.
customer_reviews.author: Delores L. Trott

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Sound amazing. Use them for gaming and with iPhone. Can’t wait to pair with a tube amp.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: The closed back 598's have a softer more comfortable padding, which I prefer over the open-back's.
customer_reviews.text: Took a little to get used to, after the first couple days of using and adjusting to the headphone's padding, the audio quality is great. I'm not an audiophile by any means, but it's a great headset for those who prefer open-back designs and like to have the option of a long wire or short mobile wire for on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Rondel Nabua

customer_reviews.title: Good price and quality.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best Headphone I had great quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: audirak

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones all around
customer_reviews.text: These do what a headphone should, they deliver clear and rich full sound without coloring the music. What was recorder is what you heart. Very comfortable and as expected Sennheiser build quality. Heard to beat fir the price, you could spend more but why bother.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: wonderful sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT noise-cancelling headphones. Since I listen in a quiet environment, it doesn't matter and it means I can hear my wife calling me to dinner while wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Kimball Quigley

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY DOLLAR!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones I use these to game on ps4 the open back system emerges you into the game AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was gaming with Steelseries Arxtis 5's and i loved them... until i got these. They are really a joy to listen to. Sound: 5 of 5 Build quality: 5 of 5 Comfort: 5 of 5
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones for playing on my PS4. They're way better than the overpriced "gaming headphones" out there.
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: i love the sound quality on these, it's so warm. i use them exclusively with my record player setup though so that may color my impressions a bit.
customer_reviews.author: chae white

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Switched my broken Beats to these, and I really like how they sound. They also feel comfortably on my ears and are quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good and comfortable High quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good and comfortable High quality. Had a buzzing noise in games that required more power an I purchased a DAC and it was gone and the quality went up too.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: this is properly is the est you can get in ...
customer_reviews.text: this is properly is the est you can get in sound quality under 150 dollars sound of open wide stage . thats what you get with these open back headphones, not suitable for listening around people .
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: People with large heads will be pleased
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones from a casual listeners standpoint. Easily best audio quality I have had in a headset (especially when you couple it with a DAC). Also extremely comfortable which is rare for me as I have a large head and most headsets give me a pinching feeling. That does not exist with these.
customer_reviews.author: BundleOjoy

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great as par for the course with Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great as par for the course with Sennheiser, waited on ordering the older model until they were all sold out...like the new headband design and the new in line microphone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: very nice upgrade from ath-m50x , and good pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: awesome headphones , I truly love them , they are very comfortable to wear for long periods of time and for games too. I bought these headphones for a replacement for my ATH-M50X , since I sweated and barely heard my own voice while being in call with my friends , in games.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: These head phones were recommeded by my grandson who composeds music
customer_reviews.text: The sound, durability qualities far exceed expectations. German engineering is very apparent in this item. Definitely a five star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dawny

customer_reviews.title: Clear sound
customer_reviews.text: good headphones. Upgraded from the superlux 668b. You can wear them for long gaming sessions and completely forget you have them on.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. No regrets whatsoever. They sound great and I'm exceptionally impressed with the inline mic. I was skeptical if the cable mic would work ok for gaming.. It does work, well enough I don't think I will bother with any 3rd party's.. The mic doesn't have a mute button but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Buy an amplifier too if you buy these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones. Sturdy design. Sound absolutely amazing with an amplifier.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Audio is great otherwise. Cable is long enough to walk around ...
customer_reviews.text: Left side's volume is lower than the right side, I'm unsure if it's just my item (can't return because it's an international purchase) but I had to use -6 !! balance in favor of the left side to compensate. (Tested on 2 PCs, a Samsung phone and an iPhone, all with same issue). Audio is great otherwise. Cable is long enough to walk around and appears to be high quality.
customer_reviews.author: DefinitelyNotKA

customer_reviews.title: Guarantee that you won't be disappointed, these are so good
customer_reviews.text: Completely blew me away. Guarantee that you won't be disappointed, these are so good. The only possible downside is that people can easily hear what you are listening to, but it's not big problem.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: I've owned these for two years
customer_reviews.text: So after two years I've had to replace the coord 3 times, which isnt to bad since they are cheap. Head band is also starting to have the cloth fall apart, but is still mechanically sound. Still sounds awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Venture

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great sound quality, although it’s plastic it’s of good quality. Detachable cord so a damaged cord can be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Drew freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Comfortable. My gaming laptop drives these. Old ones were also Sennheiser but they were a cheaper model. I think they are worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mid range headset!”
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! This headset is by far the best I have ever had. Although mine came broken but amazon quickly fixed that by sending me a new one witch I perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Reneau Family

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: I use these for mixing / mastering my podcast and for general listening. Fantastic all around
customer_reviews.author: Lipton101

customer_reviews.title: Works best in a room
customer_reviews.text: Sound staging for this headphone is great. I've used it mostly in my room. Just be aware of how loud your surrounding will be, since its an open back headphone, it will sound low with too much background sound (your fan will be your enemy lol). I've worn it for over 3hrs in a hot and humid day once, still didn't feel too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Prattay

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level headphones
customer_reviews.text: If you love music and are yet to venture into the world of audiophiles then this is a great first hifi cans.
customer_reviews.author: Abdurajik

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Cord is just barely long enough for me ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Cord is just barely long enough for me to plug it into the back of my TV and play video games.
customer_reviews.author: Ira from Champaign

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect deal
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing, I am using them for gaming, specifically for RE: 2 Remake, and the position with these are awesome. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Got these to practice guitar so I won't drive everyone in the house crazy. They sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I’ve ever owned. These sound amazing and the soundstage effect is really great!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Best Post Prodction Headphones I’ve Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable and best quality headphones I’ve ever own.. I have owned a lot of Beats headphones and these are way better than any Beats headphones I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still a beautiful listening experience
customer_reviews.text: A Hair too bassy. Still a beautiful listening experience. Don't forget, you can hear yourself sing!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hipser

customer_reviews.title: Great audio, wonderfully flat response.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, the best I've ever owned in the $200 price range!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn S.

customer_reviews.title: Very light, comfy, with amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Everything is said in the title. The headphones are open-back so expect the sound to leak. But you can at least spend hours and hours wearing them and not feel a headache or any kind of discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: El Nasr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The open back design makes these things feel like nothing when you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. The sound quality was unreal. I use these for gaming and for music. So so worth the money but definitely look out for those discounts.
customer_reviews.author: kalei

customer_reviews.title: I like everything about these Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these Headphones.Sounds great, only issue i have is i get slight ear pain after hours of use which is fine i guess to what you are experiencing with crystal clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment. Way too snug even on a women’s small head.
customer_reviews.author: GmaDar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good headphones for under 200$
customer_reviews.text: For 160$+, these headphones are superb and worth every penny for it. I've had these headphones for about 3 months and there has been no scratches or dents on the headphones. Needless to say, these headphones are well-built too.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I have ever put on BY FAR
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever put on BY FAR! More comfortable than my bose qc35, hyperx cloud2/alpha, logitech G933/G430, and more. Only down side is the bulky plug in to the cord (but that is replaceable).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the earpads.Great sound used them for Gaming and music overall great headphones

customer_reviews.title: Headphones have a great sound at all frequencies. Excellent value for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones have a great sound. We will purchase more of these.headphones soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for audiophiles
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones, unfortunately my dog broke mine and they couldn’t be replaced (sennheiser sent me some Bluetooth headphones since they lost mine to be repaired)

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: 1 year later still going on with great surround sound and comfortable velour pads for long listening sessions.

customer_reviews.title: Very good !
customer_reviews.text: Oh GOD How I Iove these headphone. Thank you Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: Maor

customer_reviews.title: Balanced
customer_reviews.text: Great balanced headphones with a clean open sound. Can’t really take in public, not portable at all but great for detailed relaxed sessions at home.
customer_reviews.author: Elcz12

customer_reviews.title: Never buying a gaming  "headset" again.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Sound++++ Amazing quality (some people complains about having some "plastic" parts but when you wear these you never feel tired ) Coming from a Logitech G633. Never coming back again.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and lightweight. A feature not highlighted enough. Perfect sound for its price. Exactly what I was looking for. This has to be the best value for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and the most comfortable headphones I have ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and the most comfortable headphones I have ever owned. Great if you find yourself wearing headphones for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Simonmaz

customer_reviews.title: Wworth itn
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product and shipping came faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: NailShines

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son. He says these are the best he has ever had
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wellington

customer_reviews.title: These are good headphones for long listening sessions
customer_reviews.text: These are good headphones for long listening sessions. I like them mainly for gaming, where their comfort and sound stage really shine. If you want a headphone strictly for listening to music, buy something else. These Sennheisers are a great open-back option. I have never owned a pair of open-back headphones, so I was pleasantly surprised by these. I tried several different pairs of headphones, but ultimately chose these for their comfort and soundstage while gaming. I can wear this headset indefinitely while barely becoming fatigued at all. The sound quality is good, but not great. Similarly priced headphones like the ATH-M50x have perceptibly better sound quality overall.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headset ever!

Searched for a while before making my purchase of this headset and I'm so glad I chose these!! Exactly what I hoped they would be!!!

product_meta.title: Sennheiser HD 598 SR Open-Back Headphone "Discontinued by manufacturer"
product_meta.description: The HD 598 SR is an open back, over ear, audiophile grade headphone that combines exceptional sound quality with extreme wearing comfort. This premium headphone is lightweight and ergonomically designed featuring a padded leatherette headband and luxurious velour covered ear pads providing extreme comfort for long listening sessions. Two cables are included, one that includes an in line single button remote with microphone for taking calls.
feature_bullets: Audiophile grade over ear, open back headphone delivering exceptionally natural and balanced sound. Connectivity Technology: Wired
Padded leatherette headband and luxurious velour covered ear pads provide extreme comfort for long listening sessions
Compatible with virtually every audio device including phones, tablets, computers and stereo components

Two cables provided a 3 meter cable terminated with a 1/4 inch jack and 1.2 meter cable terminated with a 3.5mm jack that features an in line one button remote with microphone for taking calls..2 year warranty when purchased from an authorized Sennheiser dealer
